product_name: Shimano XT RD-M786 SGS 10-Speed Rear Derailleur
long_description: Built for performance, the Shimano XT RD-M786 SGS 10-Speed rear derailleur delivers mountain-ready toughness, responsive shifting and a low-profile design to minimize exposure.
short_description: Built for performance, the Shimano XT RD-M786 SGS 10-Speed rear derailleur delivers mountain-ready toughness, responsive shifting and a low-profile design to minimize exposure.
